mapper.insert: INSERT INTO DOCUMENT_FORM ( ID, PATH, TITLE, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT, DOCUMENT_TYPE, COMPANY_ID, STAFF_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_DOCUMENT_FORM_ID.nextval, #{path}, #{title}, sysdate, sysdate, #{documentType},#{companyId},#{staffId})
mapper.select: SELECT DOC.ID ID, DOC.PATH PATH, DOC.TITLE TITLE, DOC.CREATED_AT CREATEDAT, DOC.UPDATED_AT UPDATEDAT, DOC.DOCUMENT_TYPE DOCUMENTTYPE, DOC.COMPANY_ID COMPANYID, SF.NAME NAME FROM DOCUMENT_FORM DOC INNER JOIN STAFF SF ON DOC.STAFF_ID = SF.ID ORDER BY DOC.ID DESC
